name: java.lang.annotation.Repeatable
comment: The annotation interface java.lang.annotation.Repeatable is used to indicate that the annotation interface whose declaration it (meta-)annotates is repeatable. The value of @Repeatable indicates the containing annotation interface for the repeatable annotation interface.

See Java Language Specification::
9.6.3 Repeatable Annotation Interfaces
9.7.5 Multiple Annotations of the Same Interface
